pages.text: Warlocks are known to have a very fungal brown robes with a nice sash wrapped around it. With some Red Wool you've figured out how to make your own Warlock sash and which makes it so using that a Wartful Egg no longer harms you.

The Warlock Robe causes the wearer to be resistant to explosive damages and provides a 10% chance of not consuming any Wartful Eggs. The Sash and Robe also causes Spiders to more likely drop Spider Eggs.
Much like wearing a Witches Hat and Robe, wearing Warlock Robes causes all Witches and Warlocks to be neutral and barter-able.
